comment: The elementwise intersection on a powerset is the powerset of the intersection. This allows to prove for instance that the topology induced on a subset by the discrete topology is the discrete topology on that subset. See also ~ restdis (which uses ~ distop and ~ restopn2 ). (Contributed by BJ, 27-Apr-2021.)
